constants.description: Ratio type. Numerator and denominator may be any value.
constants.name: pk_ratio

constants.description: Denominator is 100, numerator is understood as a percentage value.
constants.name: pk_percent

constants.description: Numerator and denominator are integral, and the presentation method uses a slash, e.g.  1/2 .
constants.name: pk_fraction

constants.description: Numerator and denominator are integral, and the presentation method uses a slash, e.g.  1/2 ; if the numerator is greater than the denominator, e.g. n=3, d=2, the presentation is  1 1/2 .
constants.name: pk_integer_fraction

functions.meaning: True if n is one of the defined types.
functions.name: valid_proportion_kind

meta_info.description: Class of enumeration constants defining types of proportion for the `DV_PROPORTION` class.
meta_info.name: PROPORTION_KIND
